author: Nancy Cook
title: White House wants to restart the economy, but still doesn’t have a solid plan
description: Internal competition, a lack of communication and a shortage of coronavirus testing are complicating President Donald Trump’s May 1 goal.
content:
Trump has said the White House will move ahead with reopening the economy even without the capacity to test every American for the virus. Roughly 328 million people live in the U.S., with only 2 million coronavirus tests completed as of Friday.
